FAQ:

1. Can I set my own rDNS? - **YES this is automated for ipv4 and ipv6**
2. Do you block any ports? - **No but common mail ports are surface monitored for traffic volume**
3. Can I torrent? - **Any abuse reports related to copyright infringements result in termination**
4. Can I upgrade my current VPS to one of these deals? - **Sorry no, you are welcome to cancel your current server and take a new one, I can switch the IP's if they are both active at the same time though.**
5. Is Tor allowed? - **No**
6. Do you provide any support? - **Services are self-managed by you, you can open a ticket though even if you do not take the support add-on**
7. Where are the servers? - **Clouvider DC London**
8. Test IP/LG? - **https://as62240.net/tools**
